node.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie
node.description: Cosplay Mania 2022, an annual cosplay convention in the Philippines, is set to host Hololive Indonesia's Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie this October.

node.title: Interview: Hanari, Hong Kong Cosplayer Recognized by Haachama
node.description: In this feature story, we put the spotlight on Hanari and asked her how she got into the VTuber rabbit hole, and what she felt after being recognized by one.
